response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I am confident it will also bring great value to your collection or endeavors. Before we proceed, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. If you are interested in this product, I am willing to sell it to you for $750,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates its true worth. Kindly let me know if this offer meets your expectations, so we can discuss further details or explore alternative arrangements if necessary. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 750000}
